short-title.#text:
Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and
			 Consumer Protection Technical Corrections Act of
			 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act/s:407..416

text.#text:
The table of
			 contents for the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by striking the items relating
			 to

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act

toc-entry.#text:
Sec. 407. Exemption of and
				reporting by venture capital fund advisers.

Sec. 408. Exemption of and
				reporting by certain private fund advisers.

Sec. 410. State and Federal
				responsibilities; asset threshold for Federal registration of investment
				advisers.

Sec. 412. Comptroller General
				study on custody rule costs.

Sec. 413. Adjusting the
				accredited investor standard.

Sec. 414. Rule of construction
				relating to the Commodity Exchange Act.

Sec. 415. GAO study and report
				on accredited investors.

Sec. 416. GAO study on
				self-regulatory organization for private funds.

Sec. 417. Commission study and
				report on short selling.
